attributes.action: ...encourage the British to never forget the atrocities that took place at WW2 concentration camps such as Auschwitz
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Be that by education, media campaigns or further coverage of what we should never forget.  Rwanda, Kosovo, the Balkans, and Sudan have since happened.  The World was made a promise after World War II and the UK has failed to help elsewhere since.
